item.description: A blacksmith forges a decorative ram’s head, focusing on shaping techniques, detail work, and traditional craftsmanship in artistic metalworking.

item.title: Railroad Spike Forged into an Axe
item.description: A blacksmith transforms a railroad spike into a functional axe, demonstrating forging techniques, material considerations, and skilled craftsmanship.

item.title: Forging the Wrapped Eye Axe, Part 2
item.description: Part two of forging a wrapped eye axe, focusing on advanced shaping, forge welding steps, and precise blacksmithing techniques used to refine the axe head.

item.title: Forging a Shoe Horn
item.description: A blacksmith forges a practical shoe horn from steel, demonstrating controlled hammer work, shaping techniques, and traditional shop craftsmanship.

item.title: Forging a Tomahawk at High Heat
item.description: A blacksmith forges a tomahawk at high temperatures, focusing on heat control, material behavior, and safe techniques used in traditional tool making.

item.title: Forging the Scrolls
item.description: A blacksmith demonstrates the process of forging decorative scrolls, highlighting precision, technique, and craftsmanship in metalworking.

item.title: Not Every Tool With a Handle Is a Hammer
item.description: A blacksmith explains why tools with wooden handles are not always hammers, highlighting proper tool identification, function, and correct use in the forge.

item.title: Forging an Axe from a Railroad Spike
item.description: Watch the process of forging an axe from a railroad spike, focusing on material properties, forging technique, and practical blacksmithing craftsmanship.

item.title: Forging a Hook from Leftover Scrap Steel
item.description: See how leftover scrap steel is turned into a practical forged hook, demonstrating efficient material use and fundamental blacksmithing techniques.

item.title: Railroad Spike Steel Myth Explained
item.description: A blacksmith examines common myths about railroad spike steel, explaining its composition, limitations, and appropriate uses in metalworking.

item.title: Forging a Railroad Spike Knife Project
item.description: A railroad spike is forged into a simple knife-shaped project, focusing on basic forging steps, shaping control, and beginner-friendly techniques in a blacksmith shop.

item.title: Blacksmith Ornamental Ironwork Test Piece
item.description: An ornamental ironwork test piece is forged to demonstrate control, consistency, and foundational blacksmith techniques used in traditional decorative metalwork.

item.title: Forging a Decorative Finial
item.description: A decorative finial is forged from steel, demonstrating controlled shaping, symmetry, and finishing techniques commonly used in traditional blacksmith projects.

item.title: Forging Wheat and Chevron Twists
item.description: Wheat and chevron twists are forged step by step, explaining layout, twisting methods, and control techniques used to create clean, consistent decorative elements.

item.title: Forging a Practical Household Tool
item.description: A common household tool is forged from steel, covering layout, forging steps, and finishing techniques while emphasizing safe, practical blacksmithing methods.

item.title: Making a Back Plate for a Forged Quilt Square
item.description: The back plate for a forged quilt square is laid out, forged, and fitted, highlighting craftsmanship, accuracy, and practical techniques used in decorative blacksmith work.

item.title: Restoring Worn Blacksmith Chisels
item.description: Damaged chisels are examined, reshaped, and heat treated to restore their edges and usability, demonstrating practical blacksmithing techniques and tool maintenance skills.

item.title: Using a 25 lb Little Giant Power Hammer
item.description: A close look at a 25 pound Little Giant power hammer in action, highlighting its operation, control, and how this classic machine supports efficient and precise forging work.

item.title: Making Charcoal the Old-Fashioned Way
item.description: A traditional approach to making charcoal, focusing on time-tested methods, careful process control, and how this fuel supports classic blacksmithing work.

item.title: Building a Handcrafted Shepherd’s Axe
item.description: A step-by-step look at forging and shaping a traditional shepherd’s axe, highlighting careful workmanship, tool use, and the skilled techniques behind this classic handmade piece.
